posts.name: BTS
posts.info: BTS, also known as Bangtan Sonyeondan, is a seven-member boy group known for their meaningful lyrics and powerful performances.

posts.name: Blackpink
posts.info: BLACKPINK is a four-member girl group known for their fierce image and catchy songs.

posts.name: TWICE
posts.info: TWICE is a nine-member girl group known for their bubbly and cheerful image and catchy dance tracks.

posts.name: EXO
posts.info: EXO is a nine-member boy group known for their impressive vocals and impressive choreography.

posts.name: Red Velvet
posts.info: Red Velvet is a five-member girl group known for their versatile music style and concept. They are known for incorporating different genres in their music.

posts.name: NCT 127
posts.info: NCT is a group that consists of multiple sub-units and members from all over the world. They are known for their experimental music and unique concepts.

posts.name: Seventeen
posts.info: Seventeen is a thirteen-member boy group known for their synchronized choreography and self-produced music.

posts.name: GOT7
posts.info: GOT7 is a seven-member boy group known for their energetic performances and catchy songs.

posts.name: Mamamoo
posts.info: Mamamoo is a four-member girl group known for their powerful vocals and retro-inspired music.

posts.name: ATEEZ
posts.info: ATEEZ is an eight-member boy group known for their intense performances and unique storytelling in their music videos.

posts.name: TXT
posts.info: TXT, also known as Tomorrow X Together, is a five-member boy group known for their youthful and dreamy image and music.

posts.name: ITZY
posts.info: ITZY is a five-member girl group known for their girl power image and catchy songs.

posts.name: Monsta X
posts.info: Monsta X is a six-member boy group known for their powerful performances and intense music.

posts.name: (G)I-DLE
posts.info: (G)I-DLE is a six-member girl group known for their unique sound and concept.

posts.name: Girls' Generation
posts.info: Girls' Generation is a veteran girl group that has been active since 2007. They are known for their catchy songs and glamorous image.

posts.name: EXID
posts.info: EXID is a five-member girl group known for their sultry image and catchy songs.

posts.name: SHINee
posts.info: SHINee is a veteran boy group that has been active since 2008. They are known for their impressive vocals and dance skills.

posts.name: Big Bang
posts.info: Big Bang is a veteran boy group that has been active since 2006. They are known for their unique sound and powerful performances.

posts.name: CLC
posts.info: CLC is a seven-member girl group known for their diverse music style and powerful performances.

posts.name: GFRIEND
posts.info: GFRIEND is a six-member girl group known for their innocent and pure image and synchronized dance performances.

posts.name: Oh My Girl
posts.info: Oh My Girl is a seven-member girl group known for their dreamy and ethereal music and visuals.

posts.name: AOA
posts.info: AOA is a six-member girl group known for their sexy and confident image and catchy songs.

posts.name: SuperM
posts.info: SuperM is a group that consists of members from different popular K-pop groups such as EXO, SHINee, and NCT. They are known for their powerful performances and energetic music.

posts.name: Astro
posts.info: ASTRO is a six-member boy group known for their energetic and playful image and catchy songs.

posts.name: Everglow
posts.info: Everglow is a six-member girl group known for their powerful performances and unique sound.

posts.name: IZONE
posts.info: IZONE is a twelve-member girl group formed through a survival show. They are known for their cute and bubbly image and catchy songs.

posts.name: LOONA
posts.info: LOONA is a twelve-member girl group known for their unique and creative concept, where each member had their own solo debut before debuting as a group.

posts.name: Pentagon
posts.info: Pentagon is a nine-member boy group known for their powerful performances and self-produced music.

posts.name: Weki Meki
posts.info: Weki Meki is an eight-member girl group known for their energetic performances and catchy songs.

posts.name: SF9
posts.info: SF9 is a nine-member boy group known for their powerful performances and charismatic image.

posts.name: Dreamcatcher
posts.info: Dreamcatcher is a seven-member girl group known for their rock-inspired music and dark and mysterious image.

posts.name: IU
posts.info: IU is a singer-songwriter and actress known for her sweet and emotional voice and versatile music style.

posts.name: Taeyeon
posts.info: Taeyeon is a member of the girl group Girls' Generation and a soloist known for her powerful vocals and emotional ballads.

posts.name: Chungha
posts.info: Chungha is a former member of the girl group IOI and a soloist known for her charismatic performances and dance skills.

posts.name: Baekhyun
posts.info: Baekhyun is a member of the boy group EXO and a soloist known for his smooth vocals and romantic ballads.

posts.name: Sunmi
posts.info: Sunmi is a former member of the girl group Wonder Girls and a soloist known for her confident and sexy image and catchy songs.

posts.name: Kang Daniel
posts.info: Kang Daniel is a former member of the boy group Wanna One and a soloist known for his powerful performances and catchy songs.

posts.name: Hwasa
posts.info: Hwasa is a member of the girl group Mamamoo and a soloist known for her powerful vocals and unique image.

posts.name: Heize
posts.info: Heize is a singer-songwriter and rapper known for her soulful and emotional music.

posts.name: Hyuna
posts.info: Hyuna is a former member of the girl group 4Minute and a soloist known for her sexy and bold image and catchy songs.

posts.name: Zico
posts.info: Zico is a rapper, producer, and singer known for his unique and experimental music style.

posts.name: Jay Park
posts.info: Jay Park is a rapper, singer, and CEO of the label AOMG known for his confident and charismatic image and unique music style.

posts.name: G-Dragon
posts.info: G-Dragon is a rapper, singer, and producer known for his innovative and experimental music style and fashion sense.

posts.name: Jessi
posts.info: Jessi is a rapper and singer known for her powerful and confident image and bold music.

posts.name: Davichi
posts.info: Davichi is a female duo consisting of Lee Hae-ri and Kang Min-kyung. They are known for their emotional ballads and powerful vocals.

posts.name: AKMU
posts.info: AKMU (short for Akdong Musician) is a sibling duo consisting of Lee Chan-hyuk and Lee Su-hyun. They are known for their playful and catchy songs and unique music style.
